data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Doesn't fit in the Apache:: namespace because it is not
    Apache-specific, doesn't fit in CGI:: because it is not CGI-specific
    and doesn't fit in Text:: because it is not intended to be used as a
    templating language.

    Original submission at
    http://archive.develooper.com/modules@perl.org/msg11718.html
